sentences.sContent: But let’s face it, life is filled with all kinds of tests — some you ace and some you flunk — so at some point you have to get used to it.
sentences.sContent_eng: But let’s face it, life is filled with all kinds of tests — some you ace and some you flunk — so at some point you have to get used to it.
sentences.sCn: 但，让我们面对它，生命中充满了各种各样的考试——有一些你第一而有一些你却不及格——因此，从某点说，你必须要适应它。

sentences.sContent: But let’s face it, life is filled with all kinds of tests — some you ace and some you flunk — so at some point you have to get used to it.
sentences.sContent_eng: But let’s face it, life is filled with all kinds of tests — some you ace and some you flunk — so at some point you have to get used to it.
sentences.sCn: 但是，我们得面对现实，生活充满了各种考试——有些你是好手，有些却不及格——所以从某个角度而言，必须习惯这种情况。
